statements.query: MATCH (human:Human), (user:HexnodeUser) WHERE human.email = hexnode.email MERGE (human)-[r:IDENTITY_HEXNODE]->(guser) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = $UPDATE_TAG SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG
MATCH (:Human)-[r:IDENTITY_GSUITE]->(:GSuiteUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
